title: Kirby Model 505 Owners Manual from 1945-1947 Version 3 of 3
content:
1. Information such as the country: USA  
2. Age of the sample 1947  
3. I am trying to reproduce the old manual and would like to know the fonts used so I can re-create the manual to be as close to the original one as possible.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181058im_/http:/typophile.com/files/505_3_Font_Test_4470.jpg)

Font: 

 Bookman Oldstyle
